original: The snow began to melt in the mountains and the Wuchang-Su waterfall raged.@crimea24new

description: On March 31, 1814, Russian troops under Emperor Alexander I marched into Paris, marking the triumphal capture of the city. This event signified the end of the foreign campaign of the Russian army and led to Napoleon's abdication of the throne.
original:
— On March 31, 1814, Russian troops led by Emperor Alexander I triumphantly entered Paris.
The capture of France was the final battle of the foreign campaign of the Russian army. After the fall of Paris, Napoleon abdicated the throne.
